name: Escaping Gravity
description:
Learn about Archit's origins in this dialogue-heavy Gameboy game! Interact with characters, make some difficult choices and help Archit escape Mars!

Browser Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Z - Confirm / Enter

X - Cancel

Credits:

Sodor - Music, Art, Programming

Extra Credits:

Special thanks to the GB Studio community. Without their helpful tips and tutorials, this game would not be possible!

Special thanks to community members on Twitch for being so supportive while this was in development.

Special thanks to YOU for checking out my work!
